version_description:
- Added: Arabic and Hebrew font direction reversal option
- Added: Add “TPCNotificationSound.wav” to TP4 sound resources to customize Push Notification sound
- Other: Miscellaneous improvements and fixes

- Added: Arabic and Hebrew font direction reversal option
- Added: Add “TPCNotificationSound.wav” to TP4 sound resources to customize Push Notification sound
- Other: Miscellaneous improvements and fixes

- Added: Arabic and Hebrew font direction reversal option
- Added: Add “TPCNotificationSound.wav” to TP4 sound resources to customize Push Notification sound
- Other: Miscellaneous improvements and fixes

Added:
- Support for BYOD UI file hosting in TPCloud
- ‘TPCCMD-Update,BYOD’ API support

Added:
- Support for BYOD UI file hosting in TPCloud
- ‘TPCCMD-Update,BYOD’ API support

Added:
- Support for BYOD UI file hosting in TPCloud
- ‘TPCCMD-Update,BYOD’ API support

Updated:
- Connection method
- Changes in Settings for TPControl are now applied without prompting
Fixed:
- The UI file in File Slot 1 could be lost upon retrieval of a BYOD UI file
- Not always retrieving the TPCloud UI file after file is replaced
- subPage interaction now resets Inactivity page timeout

Updated:
- Connection method
- Changes in Settings for TPControl are now applied without prompting
Fixed:
- The UI file in File Slot 1 could be lost upon retrieval of a BYOD UI file
- Not always retrieving the TPCloud UI file after file is replaced
- subPage interaction now resets Inactivity page timeout

- Connection method

- Connection method

Updated:
- Connection method

NEW:
- AMX G5 support; now use TPControl G5 files, or any G4 file
Updated:
- Connection method
- Changes in Settings for TPControl are now applied without prompting
- SIP Notifications
Fixed:
- The UI file in File Slot 1 could be lost upon retrieval of a BYOD UI file
- Not always retrieving the TPCloud UI file after file is replaced
- subPage interaction now resets Inactivity page timeout
- Certain borders were not rendering correctly with specific devices
- Case sensitivity on image names was preventing display in certain cases

NEW:
- AMX G5 support; now use TPControl G5 files, or any G4 file
Updated:
- Connection method
- Changes in Settings for TPControl are now applied without prompting
- SIP Notifications

- The UI file in File Slot 1 could be lost upon retrieval of a BYOD UI file
- Not always retrieving the TPCloud UI file after file is replaced

- Case sensitivity on image names was preventing display in certain cases

NEW:
- AMX G5 support; now use TPControl G5 files, or any G4 file
Updated:
- Connection method
- Changes in Settings for TPControl are now applied without prompting
- SIP Notifications
Fixed:
- The UI file in File Slot 1 could be lost upon retrieval of a BYOD UI file
- Not always retrieving the TPCloud UI file after file is replaced
- subPage interaction now resets Inactivity page timeout
- Certain borders were not rendering correctly with specific devices
- Case sensitivity on image names was preventing display in certain cases

Fixed:
- Crash event which could occur for a very few users
- SIP SDK issue which could result in no SIP audio in calls or ringing notification
- G5: String Output Port 2 correction
- Foreground detection that might have affected older devices, for auto-reconnect process
Updated:
- G4: Gesture detection
- G5: Ignore button double-tap when event is not defined for button
- G5: Ignore “Gesture Any” when there is a relevant other defined gesture

Fixed:
- Crash event which could occur for a very few users
- SIP SDK issue which could result in no SIP audio in calls or ringing notification
- G5: String Output Port 2 correction
- Foreground detection that might have affected older devices, for auto-reconnect process
Updated:
- G4: Gesture detection
- G5: Ignore button double-tap when event is not defined for button
- G5: Ignore “Gesture Any” when there is a relevant other defined gesture

Fixed:
- Crash event which could occur for a very few users
- SIP SDK issue which could result in no SIP audio in calls or ringing notification

- G4: Gesture detection

Fixed:
- Unicode return string format

NEW:
- Includes G5 Listview support
Fixed:
- G4: STRING OUTPUT now parsed on Push event
- Intermittent Push activation for some devices
Improved:
- ^PCT API support

Updated:
- Listview support
- G4 gesture detection
- Unicode text/character wrapping
- Popup page appearance for legacy devices

Updated:
- Listview support
- G4 gesture detection
- Unicode text/character wrapping
- Popup page appearance for legacy devices

Updated:
- Listview support
- G4 gesture detection
- Unicode text/character wrapping
- Popup page appearance for legacy devices

Added:
- G5: Page-flip password support
- G5: subPage view: Drag’n Drop & Double-tap support
Updated:
- SIP: SDK update to v4.0.1
- G5: UTF-8 format string returns
- ICSP/Authentication settings
Fixed:
- G5: Listview: line-feed characters inadvertently prefixing some NetLinx Data Source records
- G5: Bitmap Justification being impacted when updating bitmap-only for certain objects
- CMDERROR command:strings (generated by invalid API commands), which exceeded 490-chars, could crash TPControl
- Invalid API calls, which generate CMDERROR notification command:strings, could crash TPControl if greater than 490 characters

Added:
- G5: Page-flip password support
- G5: subPage view: Drag’n Drop & Double-tap support

- G5: UTF-8 format string returns
- ICSP/Authentication settings

- G5: Listview: line-feed characters inadvertently prefixing some NetLinx Data Source records
- G5: Bitmap Justification being impacted when updating bitmap-only for certain objects
- CMDERROR command:strings (generated by invalid API commands), which exceeded 490-chars, could crash TPControl
- Invalid API calls, which generate CMDERROR notification command:strings, could crash TPControl if greater than 490 characters

Added:
- Multi-file parsing support upon update

- Text / Opacity support for certain devices
- G5: Font support (For legacy sizing, refer Developer Settings)
- G5: Password support

Added:
- SIP: Customizable ring-tone via “ringtone.wav”
Fixed:
- Drag-and-Drop could result in crash for certain multi-layered objects
- “long-delay” for streams with authentication

Added:
- G5: New image scaling option: “scale-maintain-aspect-ratio”
Updated:

Fixed:
- Unexpected close of the Settings app on selection of any sub-level TPControl option.

Fixed:
- Unexpected close of the Settings app on selection of any sub-level TPControl option.

Fixed:
- Unexpected close of the Settings app on selection of any sub-level TPControl option.

Fixed:
- Intercom sound distortions for devices with iOS 13.
- Not visible characters in an input string with Dark mode enabled.

Fixed:
- Intercom sound distortions for devices with iOS 13.
- Not visible characters in an input string with Dark mode enabled.

Fixed:
- Intercom sound distortions for devices with iOS 13.
- Not visible characters in an input string with Dark mode enabled.

- Fixed application crash issue with AMX MET-ECOM and IOS13 devices
- Added support for Segoe UI and Trebuchet MS fonts with TPD5.
- Added sub-page anchoring support (enable this feature under TPControl developer settings)
- Added support for drag & drop custom event triggers between pages and pop-up pages
- Various minor fixes and improvements

- Fixed application crash issue with AMX MET-ECOM and IOS13 devices
- Added support for Segoe UI and Trebuchet MS fonts with TPD5.
- Added sub-page anchoring support (enable this feature under TPControl developer settings)
- Added support for drag & drop custom event triggers between pages and pop-up pages
- Various minor fixes and improvements

- Fixed application crash issue with AMX MET-ECOM and IOS13 devices
- Added support for Segoe UI and Trebuchet MS fonts with TPD5.
- Added sub-page anchoring support (enable this feature under TPControl developer settings)
- Added support for drag & drop custom event triggers between pages and pop-up pages
- Various minor fixes and improvements
-  Added delay to offline message dialog pop-up when device is offline from Netlinx master.
- Fixed SIP authorization issue
